text: Bad Company is a 1931 American crime drama movie directed by Tay Garnett and was based on the novel by Jack Lait. It stars Helen Twelvetrees, Ricardo Cortez, John Garrick, Paul Hurst, Frank Conroy, Harry Carey, Frank McHugh, Kenneth Thomson, Arthur Stone and Edgar Kennedy. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1931 drama movies Category:1931 crime movies Category:1930s crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Tay Garnett
title: Bad Company (1931 movie)
